short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Submit URLs to Rapid URL Indexer for indexing directly from Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Important: If you want to use this Chrome extension for link indexing, you must first buy indexing credits at https://rapidurlindexer.com/ which will give you an API key that you can find at the bottom of your "My Projects" dashboard.

This extension integrates Rapid URL Indexer's functionality directly into your browser, streamlining URL indexing and verification processes for SEO professionals, content creators, and webmasters.

Core Features:

1. URL Submission: Submit the current page URL to Rapid URL Indexer for indexing in Google Search.
2. Indexability Check: Determine if the current URL meets basic criteria for indexing by Google.
3. Index Status Verification: Check if the current URL is already present in Google's index.

Designed for users who need to:
• Monitor indexing status of web pages
• Identify potential indexing issues
• Streamline the process of submitting URLs for indexing

This extension works in conjunction with the Rapid URL Indexer service, which offers:
• Indexing without Google Search Console access
• Credit-based system (pay per indexed URL)
• Indexing reports and analytics

Note: A Rapid URL Indexer account is required to use this extension. For more information or to create an account, visit https://rapidurlindexer.com/

Changelog:
- v1.2.1: Fix: Handle single-line robots.txt rules, Fix: Handle comments in robots.txt
- v1.2: Added HTTP status check for indexability verification and improved logic
- v1.1: Fixed robots.txt disallow rules checking logic
- v1.0: Initial release
